website_summaries.verdict: This set has a lot of tools to help beginners get started easily in the hobby of wine making.
pros: Includes recipes and a DVD to explain the wine-making process
cons: You will eventually need more for your wine making than what comes in this kit

customer_reviews.title: Either not inspected prior to shipping or broken during the shipping process.
customer_reviews.text: My product arrived as scheduled. However there are several broken pieces in it. I do not wish to return the entire package but get replaced the broken articles. The glass TrueBrew Siphon glass siphon is broken in half in two places (actually crushed), the airlock is crushed and the bottle filler is cracked in various places. If I cannot get these replaced I will return the entire package.
customer_reviews.author: Decker

customer_reviews.title: what each item does
customer_reviews.text: Lots of different pieces. Absolutely NO instructions. List of items but no picture to determine which item is which. I have never made wine before and do not know the ingredients. There is NO recipe included either. I'm going to try and find out what I need to know from their website.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn

customer_reviews.title: everything you need
customer_reviews.text: This kit contains everything that is needed to get started on wine making. The only thing that I purchased beyond the kit was a carboy brush. The bottle brush that came with the kit was too small. I also purchased a different kind of sanitizer but that was a matter of preference. Since May, I have produced over 200 bottles and I can't seem to stop. Its an addictive hobby.
customer_reviews.author: RH

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control
customer_reviews.text: The unit arrived fine, one of the plastic filter tube is shattered inside the plastic bag as if some one stepped on it. It is not during shipping. If they would've look at it, it would've been thrown out.
customer_reviews.author: Leng Vang

customer_reviews.title: would be 5 star if I would not have had broken parts on receiving
customer_reviews.text: would be 5 star if I would not have had broken parts on receiving. also the bottler isn't great nor it the corker. has small issues
customer_reviews.author: Jake G

customer_reviews.title: Damaged
customer_reviews.text: The auto siphon and graduated cylinder were broken and shattered on arrival.
customer_reviews.author: amanda

customer_reviews.title: NO Instructions at ALL
customer_reviews.text: Some parts even arrived broken!! We struggled as newbies to figure out what to do. Thanks to you tube and videos and not this kit did we somewhat know what to do with kit. Not an ultimate kit if you don't know what you are doing.
customer_reviews.author: Florence

customer_reviews.title: Wondering
customer_reviews.text: Above average on the products BUT wish it came with a small packet of wine yeast. Would I recommend it to my friends? Would check if their are better kits before ordering this again.
customer_reviews.author: Steven D.

customer_reviews.title: Instructions
customer_reviews.text: I did not like the fact that I got no instructions with it. No recipes. This being my first time making wine .
customer_reviews.author: judy vomachka

customer_reviews.title: I feel safe when wearing this mask.
customer_reviews.text: The masks seem ok for virus protection along with social distancing and hands washing
customer_reviews.author: Sandy

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This kit has everything! I am glad I picked this wine equipment kit, because it is packed with all the things to start making wine.
customer_reviews.author: Lloyd F. Booker

customer_reviews.title: Top Notch Company
customer_reviews.text: This is my first year making my own wine from grapes that I harvested this year. I bought this starter kit form the Midwest Brewing Company and they have gone above and beyond helping me. Not only do they have top quality merchandise they are more that happy to assist with any question about making wine that you have no matter how silly you think it is. I will definately buy all my wine or beer making equipment from this wonderful company.
customer_reviews.author: Bevely Estep

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: This company was very efficient during the holiday system and got the product to my family before Christmas. Great starter kit with everything needed to make wine except the ingredients.
customer_reviews.author: Billy

customer_reviews.title: Got item as described
customer_reviews.text: Everything was as described. Very please with this purchase, no complains. This DVD is ok, but no a selling point. The corker it self seems very sturdy. Will keep you updated when I finally bottle my wine.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Georges

customer_reviews.title: Great kit for someone new at wine making!
customer_reviews.text: We made 4 gallons of dry Concord Grape wine with the kit. Our neighbor has a vineyard and makes small batches of wine for other growers, so we gave the 6 gallon carboy to him. I bought 4 1-gallon carboys which were easier to maneuver. Looking forward to tasting our creation in a few months!
customer_reviews.author: Renee T.

product_meta.title: Strange Brew Home Brew Winemaking Kit Strange Brew Home-Brew Winemaking Kit Ultimate Wine Making Equipment Starter Kit with 6 gal Glass Carboy
product_meta.description: This excellent winemaking Kit includes winemaking equipment is one of the most complete equipment kits you will find. This fine wine Kit includes a 6 gallon glass carboy and more. See complete contents below. The fine wine Kit includes: 7.8 gallon primary fermenting bucket with drilled and grommet lid, 6 gallon glass carboy with rubber stopper, 3-Piece airlock (for fermenting bucket), adhesive thermometer (for fermenting bucket), glass triple scale hydrometer, auto-siphon with 5' of flexible tubing and dual function bottle filler, 8 packets of c-brite cleanser, 30 natural micro-agglomerated corks, twin lever corker, 24\" plastic spoon, wine bottle brush, de-gassing rod, great starter equipment Kit for winemaking., includes de-gassing wand much, much more!, make 6 gallons of high quality home-brewed wine., country of origin - United States, manufacturer name - winemaking.Net.
